Book Guido
Podcasting

Podcasts that I host & produce

Podcasting is a great way to learn, share and get to know people. I've published over 250 episodes for different podcasts:

Sheeptank

A lighthearted and fast paced approach to presenting a single interesting business case (by the sheep) and ultimate judgement (by the wolves).

CRO.CAFE

Podcast about Conversion Rate Optimization and Business Experimentation. With episodes in English, Dutch, Spanish and German.

Spryker Community

Highlighting the stories from our community, sharing insights and best practices.
